creator: Kingboat
descriptionHtml:
What would you do if everything was suddenly taken—no, STOLEN from you?
Your money. Your family's business. Your father's life. Even your girlfriend? Gone.
All taken away by a despicible man you used to call "boss".

It's time for revenge!

Join in on this exciting interactive journey of a fellow who seeks to avenge his father's death and claim back everything that was once his. His ultimate mission? To bring down the boss who took everything. How? By building something greater and getting ridiculously rich—way richer than the evil boss!

Build and manage a mega-luxurious hotel that has everything...spas, shops, restaurants, markets, nightlife, and much more! You may need to start small at first...but, with your effort and management skills—watch your businesses grow and shoot through the roof!

Remember: the more amenities and businesses you're able to open at your hotel, the more visitors you'll have...which means—money...lots of MONEY! Continue upgrading in order to keep your visitors happy and coming back for more.

It won't be long before your boss meets his match and pays for his awful sins!
descriptionShort: Get revenge and take back what's rightfully yours—let's start by getting rich!

appDetails.developerAddress: OFFICE UNIT B 9/F THOMSON COMM,BLDG 8 THOMSON RD
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Version is Available Now！
Optimization of Game experience.
Hope you enjoy it.

title: Perfect Avenger

container.value: OFFICE UNIT B 9/F THOMSON COMM,BLDG 8 THOMSON RD

creator: Kingboat
descriptionHtml:
What would you do if everything was suddenly taken—no, STOLEN from you?
Your money. Your family's business. Your father's life. Even your girlfriend? Gone.
All taken away by a despicible man you used to call "boss".

It's time for revenge!

Join in on this exciting interactive journey of a fellow who seeks to avenge his father's death and claim back everything that was once his. His ultimate mission? To bring down the boss who took everything. How? By building something greater and getting ridiculously rich—way richer than the evil boss!

Build and manage a mega-luxurious hotel that has everything...spas, shops, restaurants, markets, nightlife, and much more! You may need to start small at first...but, with your effort and management skills—watch your businesses grow and shoot through the roof!

Remember: the more amenities and businesses you're able to open at your hotel, the more visitors you'll have...which means—money...lots of MONEY! Continue upgrading in order to keep your visitors happy and coming back for more.

It won't be long before your boss meets his match and pays for his awful sins!
descriptionShort: Get revenge and take back what's rightfully yours—let's start by getting rich!

descriptionShort: Get revenge and take back what's rightfully yours—let's start by getting rich!
title:
Perfect Avenger
2.5.4

creator: Aidian Network
descriptionHtml:
Expand your business empire! Take back what originally belongs to you and complete the revenge!

Have you ever dreamed of owning a super mall?
In this relaxing and engaging mall time management game, you'll start from scratch with the goal of proving your skills as a mall manager. Your mission is to create a popular and well-stocked super mall, skillfully choosing to upgrade employees or stores, and striving to become a business tycoon. In this fun game, you'll build your own business empire, step by step, to gain the trust of your father's killer and complete your revenge. He took everything from you, and you will take it all back!

Build First-Class Services
Manage the first store in the mall, taking the first step to becoming a mall manager and starting your path to revenge. This game offers the thrill of managing a bustling business.

Build More Stores
Explore and expand a large number of stores, with more than a dozen different types of stores on each floor to unlock and upgrade to perfection. Provide customers with a variety of comfortable services, excel in each store through unlocking and upgrading, as well as managing employees. Prove your abilities as a mall manager in this engaging tycoon game, gain the trust of the boss, and be ready to take away his property!

Constantly Improve Your Mall
To succeed in this industry and surpass super malls like Walmart, Sam's Club, and Costco, simply wandering the mall and serving customers isn't enough. Upgrade each store to the highest level, manage each employee well, improve service levels, ensure employees work efficiently, and always be prepared for unexpected events in the game. Serving every customer well will increase your income. This level of detailed management is akin to running a complex hotel in a free game or managing a farm in a farming simulator.

Gain Their Trust
Gain the trust of the boss's daughter, mall guests, and even a sexy model. They will become essential allies in managing the mall and achieving your revenge. They aren't just employees and customers; they might also become your partners! Much like in sims games, building relationships is key to success.

Superb Human Resource Management
Proper management is essential to ensure the operation of each store. From service desks to receive customers, parking lots to provide parking spaces, luxury stores to increase revenue and brand value, to high-end restaurants providing meals to customers, each store requires manpower to function. Hiring suitable employees to satisfy as many customers as possible will be a significant challenge! This aspect of the game can be enjoyed by fans of tycoon games and those looking for a detailed PS app experience.

Five-Star Fun
Are you looking for an original and easy-to-play time management game? Dive into this fast-paced mall world and develop your skills as a mall manager, investor, and avenger! Take back what originally belongs to you and complete the revenge! This game is a great addition to your collection of fun games.
descriptionShort: Build your dream market empire in this idle tycoon simulator! Revenge awaits!
title:
Perfect avenger — Tycoon Games
2.6.5

Upgrade each store to the highest level, manage each employee well, improve service levels, ensure employees work efficiently, and always be prepared for unexpected events in the game. Serving every customer well will increase your income. This level of detailed management is akin to running a complex hotel in a free game or managing a farm in a farming simulator.

Gain Their Trust
Gain the trust of the boss's daughter, mall guests, and even a sexy model. They will become essential allies in managing the mall and achieving your revenge. They aren't just employees and customers; they might also become your partners! Much like in sims games, building relationships is key to success.

Superb Human Resource Management
Proper management is essential to ensure the operation of each store. From service desks to receive customers, parking lots to provide parking spaces, luxury stores to increase revenue and brand value, to high-end restaurants providing meals to customers, each store requires manpower to function. Hiring suitable employees to satisfy as many customers as possible will be a significant challenge! This aspect of the game can be enjoyed by fans of tycoon games and those looking for a detailed PS app experience.

Five-Star Fun
Are you looking for an original and easy-to-play time management game? Dive into this fast-paced mall world and develop your skills as a mall manager, investor, and avenger! Take back what originally belongs to you and complete the revenge! This game is a great addition to your collection of fun games.
descriptionShort: Build your dream market empire in this idle tycoon simulator! Revenge awaits!
